name: CXPlayDTMFCallAction.ActionType
desc: The types of events that generate dial tones.

items.name: case singleTone
items.desc: Indicates that the user tapped a digit on the in-call keypad.

items.name: case softPause
items.desc: Indicates that the user included digits after a soft pause in their dial string. A soft pause is indicated by a comma (,) and waits a few seconds before dialing the additional digits.

items.name: case hardPause
items.desc: Indicates that the user included digits after a hard pause in their dial string. A hard pause is indicated by a semicolon (;) and waits for further user interaction before dialing the additional digits.
